description:
As a customer
  I want to manage items in my shopping cart
  So that I can purchase the right products

steps.name: I am on the cart page
I add product "board-game-123" to cart
the cart total should be 29.99
I am on the cart page
I add product "board-game-123" to cart
I remove product "board-game-123" from cart
the cart should be empty
I am on the cart page
I add product "board-game-123" to cart with quantity 2
the cart total should be 59.98
I am on the cart page
I add product "card-game-456" to cart with quantity 3
the cart total should be 44.97

name: Shopping Cart Management

description:
The shopping cart allows customers to manage selected products before checkout.
  As a customer
  I want to add, update, and remove products in my cart
  So that I can prepare my order before purchasing

steps.name: the user is logged in
the product "Catan" exists with stock = 10
the user opened the product page
the user clicked "Add to Cart"
the user set quantity to "2"
the product "Catan" is added to the cart with quantity = 2
the subtotal is calculated correctly
the user is logged in
the cart contains product "Catan" with quantity = 2
the user increased quantity to "5"
the cart updates product "Catan" quantity to "5"
the subtotal is recalculated
the user is logged in
the cart contains product "Catan" with quantity = 3
the user decreased quantity to "1"
the cart updates product "Catan" quantity to "1"
the subtotal is recalculated
the user is logged in
the cart contains product "Catan" with quantity = 2
the user clicked "Remove"
the product "Catan" is removed from the cart
the subtotal is updated accordingly
the user is logged in
the cart contains product "Catan" with quantity = 2 and price = 40
the cart contains product "Carcassonne" with quantity = 1 and price = 30
the user opened the cart page "/cart"
the cart shows "Catan" with total = 80
the cart shows "Carcassonne" with total = 30
the subtotal is "110"
the user is logged in
the product "Catan" exists with stock = 10
the user clicked "Add to Cart"
the user set quantity to "0"
the system shows an error "Quantity must be at least 1"
the product is not added to the cart
the user is logged in
the product "Catan" exists with stock = 5
the user clicked "Add to Cart"
the user set quantity to "10"
the system shows an error "Not enough stock available"
the product is not added to the cart

elements.name: Add product that is out of stock

steps.name: the user is logged in
the product "Catan" exists with stock = 0
the user clicked "Add to Cart"
the system shows an error "Product is out of stock"
the product is not added to the cart
the user is logged in
the cart is empty
the user opened the cart page "/cart"
the system shows message "Your cart is empty"
the subtotal is "0"

name: Shopping Cart

description:
As a customer
  I want to browse the product catalog
  So that I can find products I'm interested in

steps.name: I am on the product catalog page
I filter by category "board-games"
I should see products in the "board-games" category
I should see the category filter is active
I am on the product catalog page
I sort products by "price-asc"
I should see products sorted by price in ascending order
I am on the product catalog page
I filter by category "board-games"
I sort products by "price-asc"
I should see products in the "board-games" category
they should be sorted by "price-asc"
I am on the product catalog page
I filter by category "card-games"
I sort products by "price-desc"
I should see products in the "card-games" category
they should be sorted by "price-desc"
I am on the product catalog page
I filter by category "accessories"
I sort products by "name-asc"
I should see products in the "accessories" category
they should be sorted by "name-asc"

name: Product Catalog Browsing

description:
The checkout feature allows customers to provide shipping and payment details
  As a customer
  I want to complete the checkout process
  So that I can place my order successfully

elements.name: Successful checkout with shipping and payment

steps.name: the user is logged in
the cart contains 2 products with subtotal "100"
the user opened the checkout page "/checkout"
the user entered valid shipping details
the user entered valid billing details
the user selected "Credit Card" as payment method
the user entered valid card details
the user clicked the "Place Order" button
a new order is created with status "paid"
the cart is emptied
the confirmation email is sent to the user

elements.name: Successful checkout using "Use shipping as billing address"

steps.name: the user is logged in
the cart contains 2 products with subtotal "100"
the user opened the checkout page "/checkout"
the user entered valid shipping details
the user checked the "Use shipping as billing address" checkbox
the user selected "LiqPay" as payment method
the user clicked the "Place Order" button
a new order is created with status "paid"
the cart is emptied
the user is logged in
the cart contains 2 products with subtotal "100"
the user opened the checkout page "/checkout"
the user left the "Address" field empty
the user clicked the "Place Order" button
the system shows an error "Address is required"
the order is not created
the user is logged in
the cart contains 2 products with subtotal "100"
the user opened the checkout page "/checkout"
the user entered Email "invalid-email"
the user clicked the "Place Order" button
the system shows an error "Invalid email format"
the order is not created
the user is logged in
the cart contains 2 products with subtotal "100"
the user opened the checkout page "/checkout"
the user entered Phone "abc123"
the user clicked the "Place Order" button
the system shows an error "Invalid phone number"
the order is not created
the user is logged in
the cart contains 2 products with subtotal "100"
the user opened the checkout page "/checkout"
the user entered ZIP Code "1"
the user clicked the "Place Order" button
the system shows an error "Invalid ZIP Code"
the order is not created

elements.name: Checkout with credit card but missing payment details

steps.name: the user is logged in
the cart contains 2 products with subtotal "100"
the user opened the checkout page "/checkout"
the user entered valid shipping details
the user selected "Credit Card" as payment method
the user left the card number empty
the user clicked the "Place Order" button
the system shows an error "Card number is required"
the order is not created
the user is logged in
the cart contains 2 products with subtotal "100"
the cart is empty
the user opened the checkout page "/checkout"
the user clicked the "Place Order" button
the system shows an error "Cart is empty"
the order is not created

name: Checkout

description:
The order feature allows customers to convert their shopping cart into a confirmed order.
  As a customer
  I want to place orders and view my past orders
  So that I can complete purchases and keep track of my shopping history

steps.name: the user is logged in
the cart contains 2 products
the user opened the checkout page "/checkout"
the user entered valid shipping details
the user entered valid payment details
the user clicked the "Place Order" button
a new order is created with status "new"
products are moved from cart_items to order_items
the cart is emptied
the user is logged in
the database contains 3 orders for the logged in user
the user requests GET /api/orders/
the response returns 3 orders
each order contains items and total price
the user is logged in
the database contains an order owned by user "UserA"
the current logged in user is "UserB"
the user requests GET /api/orders/1/
the system returns 403 Forbidden

elements.name: Place an order with empty cart

steps.name: the user is logged in
the cart is empty
the user clicked the "Place Order" button
the system shows an error "Cart is empty"
the order is not created
the user is logged in
the user has an existing order with status "new"
the user clicked the "Cancel Order" button
the order status is updated to "canceled"
the user is logged in
the user has an existing order with status "paid"
the user clicked the "Cancel Order" button
the system shows an error "Cannot cancel a paid order"
the order status remains "paid"

name: Orders

description:
The payment feature allows customers to securely pay for their orders.
  As a customer
  I want to choose a payment method and complete a transaction
  So that I can finalize my purchase and receive my products

steps.name: the user is logged in
the user has an existing order with status "new"
the user selected "LiqPay" as payment method
the user completed a successful LiqPay transaction
the order status is updated to "paid"
a payment record is stored in the database
the user is logged in
the user has an existing order with status "new"
the user selected "Credit Card" as payment method
the user entered card number "4242424242424242"
the user entered expiry date "12/29"
the user entered CVV "123"
the user clicked the "Pay" button
the order status is updated to "paid"
a payment record is stored in the database
the user is logged in
the user has an existing order with status "new"
the user selected "Credit Card" as payment method
the user entered card number "123456"
the user entered expiry date "12/29"
the user entered CVV "123"
the user clicked the "Pay" button
the system shows an error "Invalid card number"
the order status remains "new"
the user is logged in
the user has an existing order with status "new"
the user selected "Credit Card" as payment method
the user entered card number "4242424242424242"
the user entered expiry date "01/20"
the user entered CVV "123"
the user clicked the "Pay" button
the system shows an error "Card expired"
the order status remains "new"
the user is logged in
the user has an existing order with status "new"
the user selected "Credit Card" as payment method
the user entered card number "4242424242424242"
the user entered expiry date "12/29"
the user entered CVV "12"
the user clicked the "Pay" button
the system shows an error "Invalid CVV"
the order status remains "new"
the user is logged in
the user has an existing order with status "new"
the user selected "Credit Card" as payment method
the user entered valid card details
the payment provider declined the transaction
the system shows an error "Payment declined"
the order status remains "new"

elements.name: Attempt payment on an already paid order

steps.name: the user is logged in
the user has an existing order with status "new"
the user has an order with status "paid"
the user tried to perform another payment
the system shows an error "Order already paid"
no new transaction is created

name: Payment

description:
The promo code feature allows customers to apply discount codes to their orders.
  As a customer
  I want to use valid promo codes
  So that I can reduce the total price of my order

elements.name: Apply a valid percentage promo code

steps.name: the user is logged in
the user has an existing order in the cart with subtotal "100"
the promo code "DISCOUNT10" is active
the promo code gives a 10 percent discount
the promo code expiry date is in the future
the user entered the promo code "DISCOUNT10"
the user clicked the "Apply" button
the order total is updated to "90"
the discount is displayed in the order summary

elements.name: Apply a valid fixed amount promo code

steps.name: the user is logged in
the user has an existing order in the cart with subtotal "100"
the promo code "SAVE20" is active
the promo code gives a fixed discount of "20"
the promo code expiry date is in the future
the user entered the promo code "SAVE20"
the user clicked the "Apply" button
the order total is updated to "80"
the discount is displayed in the order summary
the user is logged in
the user has an existing order in the cart with subtotal "100"
the promo code "SALE20" exists
the promo code expiry date is in the past
the user entered the promo code "SALE20"
the user clicked the "Apply" button
the system shows an error "Promo code expired"
the discount is not applied
the order total remains "100"
the user is logged in
the user has an existing order in the cart with subtotal "100"
the promo code "VIP30" exists
the promo code is inactive
the user entered the promo code "VIP30"
the user clicked the "Apply" button
the system shows an error "Promo code is not active"
the discount is not applied
the user is logged in
the user has an existing order in the cart with subtotal "100"
the user entered the promo code "FAKECODE"
the user clicked the "Apply" button
the system shows an error "Invalid promo code"
the discount is not applied

elements.name: Apply promo code with minimum order value requirement

steps.name: the user is logged in
the user has an existing order in the cart with subtotal "100"
the promo code "BIGSALE50" is active
the promo code requires a minimum order value of "200"
the user entered the promo code "BIGSALE50"
the user clicked the "Apply" button
the system shows an error "Order does not meet minimum value requirement"
the discount is not applied

elements.name: Apply promo code to an already paid order

steps.name: the user is logged in
the user has an existing order in the cart with subtotal "100"
the user has an order with status "paid"
the user tried to apply the promo code "DISCOUNT10"
the system shows an error "Cannot apply promo code to paid order"
the discount is not applied

name: Promo Codes

description:
The login feature allows registered users to access their accounts.
  As a registered user
  I want to log in with my credentials
  So that I can access my orders and profile

steps.name: the user opened the login page "/login"
the user entered Email "john.doe@example.com"
the user entered Password "Secret123"
the user clicked the "Sign In" button
the system authenticates the user
the user is redirected to the account page "/account"
the user opened the login page "/login"
the user entered Email "john.doe@example.com"
the user entered Password "WrongPass"
the user clicked the "Sign In" button
the system shows an error "Invalid credentials"
the user is not logged in
the user opened the login page "/login"
the user entered Email "newuser@example.com"
the user entered Password "Secret123"
the user clicked the "Sign In" button
the system shows an error "No account found with this email"
the user is not logged in
the user opened the login page "/login"
the user clicked the "Sign In" button
the system shows errors "Email is required" and "Password is required"
the user is not logged in
the user opened the login page "/login"
the user "inactive@example.com" exists in the database with is_active = false
the user entered Email "inactive@example.com"
the user entered Password "Secret123"
the user clicked the "Sign In" button
the system shows an error "Account not activated. Please check your email."
the user is not logged in
the user opened the login page "/login"
the user clicked "Sign in with Google"
the OAuth provider authenticated the user
the system logs the user in
the user is redirected to the account page "/account"
the user opened the login page "/login"
the user clicked "Sign in with Facebook"
the OAuth provider authenticated the user
the system logs the user in
the user is redirected to the account page "/account"
the user opened the login page "/login"
the user clicked "Continue as Guest"
the system creates a guest session
the user is redirected to the home page "/"

name: User Login

description:
The password recovery feature allows users to reset their password if forgotten.
  As a registered user
  I want to reset my password via email
  So that I can regain access to my account

steps.name: the user opened the password recovery page "/forgot-password"
the user entered Email "john.doe@example.com"
the user clicked the "Submit" button
the system sends a reset link to "john.doe@example.com"
the system shows message "Reset link sent to your email"

elements.name: Request password reset with unregistered email

steps.name: the user opened the password recovery page "/forgot-password"
the user entered Email "notfound@example.com"
the user clicked the "Submit" button
the system shows message "If this email exists, a reset link will be sent"
no email is sent

elements.name: Request password reset with invalid email format

steps.name: the user opened the password recovery page "/forgot-password"
the user entered Email "invalid-email"
the user clicked the "Submit" button
the system shows an error "Invalid email format"
no email is sent
the user opened the password recovery page "/forgot-password"
the user followed the reset link with valid uid and token
the user opened the reset password page "/reset-password"
the user entered New Password "NewSecret123"
the user entered Confirm Password "NewSecret123"
the user clicked the "Reset Password" button
the system updates the user password
the system shows message "Password has been successfully reset"
the user opened the password recovery page "/forgot-password"
the user followed the reset link with valid uid and token
the user opened the reset password page "/reset-password"
the user entered New Password "NewSecret123"
the user entered Confirm Password "WrongPass"
the user clicked the "Reset Password" button
the system shows an error "Passwords do not match"
the password is not updated
the user opened the password recovery page "/forgot-password"
the user followed the reset link with expired token
the user opened the reset password page "/reset-password"
the user entered New Password "NewSecret123"
the user entered Confirm Password "NewSecret123"
the user clicked the "Reset Password" button
the system shows an error "Invalid or expired token"
the password is not updated
the user opened the password recovery page "/forgot-password"
the user followed the reset link with invalid token
the user opened the reset password page "/reset-password"
the user entered New Password "NewSecret123"
the user entered Confirm Password "NewSecret123"
the user clicked the "Reset Password" button
the system shows an error "Invalid or expired token"
the password is not updated

name: Password Recovery

description:
The registration feature allows new users to create accounts.
  As a visitor
  I want to register with my email and password
  So that I can manage my orders and access discounts

steps.name: the user opened the registration page "/register"
the user entered First Name "John"
the user entered Last Name "Doe"
the user entered Email "john.doe@example.com"
the user entered Password "Secret123"
the user entered Confirm Password "Secret123"
the user checked the Privacy Policy checkbox
the user clicked the "Create Account" button
an account is created in the database with is_active = false
